abstract: Yūichi Komano (駒野 友一, Komano Yūichi, born 25 July 1981 in Kainan, Wakayama) is a Japanese football player. He plays for J. League division 1 side Júbilo Iwata. He is right-footed and mainly plays right full back for the club but he is often employed in the left for Japan national football team.
